description: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science from the SJB Institute of Technology, Bangalore, Karnataka. Motivated React/Next.js developer with over 2 years of experience in building performant and secure web applications. Skilled in API integration, data management, and creating collaborative user experiences.
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science from the SJB Institute of Technology, Bangalore, Karnataka, completed in 2022.
React/Next.js developer with over 2 years of experience. Developed and maintained web applications, integrated APIs, and created collaborative user experiences.

React.js Freelance Developer from November 2021 to December 2023. Developed and maintained a temperature-controlled logistics application, achieved a 15% reduction in delivery reporting turnaround times, integrated one-click Stripe payment, utilized the Jest unit testing framework, designed and implemented RESTful APIs, handled over 50,000 API requests per month, and integrated the Samsara API for real-time temperature and location tracking.

Next.js Freelance Developer from February 2023 to February 2024. Developed a custom, invite-only community web app using Next.js, focused on fostering youth entrepreneur networking. Leveraged TypeScript for type safety and maintainability, utilized Prisma ORM for data persistence and retrieval, and integrated Timely for goal progress tracking.

Proficient in JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Clerk for authentication, Hasura Data Delivery Network, GraphQL APIs, Vercel-Meticulous AI for testing, Sanity.io for CMS, Astro.build for building content-driven websites, GitHub, GitLab, Vercel for CI/CD, Drizzle ORM, UIVerse.io for open-source UI elements, Lemon Squeezy for SaaS Subscription Payment Integration, Astra DB for AI databases and vector embedding, Twilio for cloud communications, Knock for notification APIs, Doppler for secrets management, AWS S3, SST-ION for cloud infrastructure, Vercel, and Fly.io for deployment.
Developed several notable projects: Next.js Patient Management System, React Admin Dashboard App, React Portfolio, Next.js Self AI Chatbot called Roadside Coder.
